meanings.sent1: The gomeral always makes silly mistakes.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a gomeral and listen to bad advice.
meanings.sent3: The gomeral thought it was a good idea to wear socks with sandals.
meanings.sent4: His actions made him the gomeral of the group.
meanings.sent5: She stood out as the biggest gomeral in the room.

meanings.sent1: His gomeral of a decision led to trouble.
meanings.sent2: Avoid gomeral like behavior if you want to succeed.
meanings.sent3: The gomeral of trying to fit a watermelon in his pocket was comical.
meanings.sent4: Procrastination is a gomeral that can hold you back.
meanings.sent5: The gomeral of ignoring warnings resulted in a mess.
